death-note.title: Death Note
death-note.synopsis: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that grants its user the ability to kill anyone whose name and face they know.

monster.title: Monster
monster.synopsis: A brilliant neurosurgeon's life is ruined when he chooses to save a young boy's life instead of operating on the town mayor.

psycho-pass.title: Psycho-Pass
psycho-pass.synopsis: In a future society where people's mental states are constantly monitored, a young inspector joins the police force to uphold justice.

perfect-blue.title: Perfect Blue
perfect-blue.synopsis: A pop idol retires to pursue an acting career, but her mental state deteriorates as she's stalked by an obsessive fan.

paranoia-agent.title: Paranoia Agent
paranoia-agent.synopsis: A social phenomenon spreads throughout Tokyo as a mysterious figure known as Lil' Slugger attacks people in crisis.

ghost-in-the-shell.title: Ghost in the Shell
ghost-in-the-shell.synopsis: In a future where humans are extensively augmented with cybernetic parts, a cyborg policewoman hunts a mysterious hacker.

serial-experiments-lain.title: Serial Experiments Lain
serial-experiments-lain.synopsis: A teenage girl becomes increasingly obsessed with the Wired, a global communications network similar to the internet.

steins-gate.title: Steins;Gate
steins-gate.synopsis: A self-proclaimed mad scientist accidentally discovers time travel and becomes entangled in a conspiracy involving SERN.

cowboy-bebop.title: Cowboy Bebop
cowboy-bebop.synopsis: A ragtag group of bounty hunters chase criminals across the solar system while dealing with their own troubled pasts.

akira.title: Akira
akira.synopsis: In a dystopian Neo-Tokyo, a biker gang member gains telekinetic abilities after a motorcycle accident.

a-silent-voice.title: A Silent Voice
a-silent-voice.synopsis: A former bully seeks redemption by reconnecting with a deaf girl he tormented in elementary school.

march-comes-in-like-a-lion.title: March Comes in Like a Lion
march-comes-in-like-a-lion.synopsis: A young professional shogi player deals with depression and finds a new family in three sisters who take him in.

your-lie-in-april.title: Your Lie in April
your-lie-in-april.synopsis: A piano prodigy who lost his ability to hear the piano after his mother's death meets a free-spirited violinist.

barakamon.title: Barakamon
barakamon.synopsis: A young calligrapher is exiled to a rural island where he learns to appreciate the simple things in life.

ping-pong-the-animation.title: Ping Pong the Animation
ping-pong-the-animation.synopsis: Two friends with contrasting personalities navigate their way through the competitive world of high school table tennis.

made-in-abyss.title: Made in Abyss
made-in-abyss.synopsis: A young girl ventures into a mysterious abyss in search of her mother, accompanied by a strange robot boy.

mushishi.title: Mushishi
mushishi.synopsis: A traveling medicine man helps people troubled by supernatural creatures called Mushi that exist in harmony with nature.

fullmetal-alchemist-brotherhood.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
fullmetal-alchemist-brotherhood.synopsis: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical experiment.

mononoke.title: Mononoke
mononoke.synopsis: A medicine seller travels Japan during the Edo period, exorcising malevolent spirits by uncovering their form, truth, and reason.

spirited-away.title: Spirited Away
spirited-away.synopsis: A young girl enters a world of spirits and must work in a bathhouse to free herself and her parents.

houseki-no-kuni.title: Land of the Lustrous
houseki-no-kuni.synopsis: In a world inhabited by crystalline beings, a young gem fights to protect their friends from invaders from the moon.

shinsekai-yori.title: From the New World
shinsekai-yori.synopsis: In a utopian world where humans have psychic powers, a group of friends uncover dark secrets about their society.

haibane-renmei.title: Haibane Renmei
haibane-renmei.synopsis: A girl with no memories is born into a world where people have halos and wings, living in a town surrounded by walls.

kaiba.title: Kaiba
kaiba.synopsis: In a future where memories can be stored and bodies replaced, a man with no memories searches for his identity.

dennou-coil.title: Den-noh Coil
dennou-coil.synopsis: In a near-future Japan where augmented reality is commonplace, children investigate mysteries in the virtual world.
